_header: On morrow morn cometh all our care
_description: Death comes suddenly — one couplet in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
On monewe (sic) morwen comet al oure careWan borwed
                    ware wil home fare
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 24.
